item.title: ThreeJS实现3D中国地图
item.description: 实现 3D 中国地图 1. 示例 2. 构建基础模板 2.1 安装依赖项 npm i three d3 axios npm i @types/three @types/d3 -D { "name": "demo-threejs-chinamap", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "dependencies": { ... "axios": "^1.3.4", "d3": "^7.8.2", "three": "^0.150.1", }, ... "devDependencies": { "@types/d3": "^7.4.0", "@types/three": "^0.149.0" } } 2.2 构建基础模板 import { useCallback, useEffect,
